metadata.title: CVE-2013-6765 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenVAS Manager 3.0 before 3.0.7 and 4.0 before 4.0.4 allows remoteattackers to bypass the OMP authentication restrictions and execute OMPcommands via a crafted OMP request for version information, which causesthe state to be set to CLIENT_AUTHENTIC, as demonstrated by theomp_xml_handle_end_element function in omp.c.

criterions.comment: openvas-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
